title: Competency-Enhancement Program Based on Physical Therapy Simulation Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physical therapy theories and anatomical knowledge
context.additional_context: Emphasizes mobile learning environments using personal devices and simulation activities mimicking real clinical scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can apply physical therapy assessment protocols with 80% accuracy in simulation environments.
Learners can improve communication and clinical judgment skills by at least three levels in patient-scenario-based practice.
Learners can self-assess and peer-assess clinical performance using digital evaluation tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
